mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board AS b INNER JOIN board_large AS bl ON b.board_l_code = bl.board_l_code WHERE bl.board_l_name = #{boardLName} AND b.l_code = #{lCode} ORDER BY b.board_date DESC
SELECT max(board_code) AS max FROM board
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (board_code, l_code, u_id, board_l_code, board_m_code, board_title, board_pw, board_content, board_open, board_page_view, board_date) VALUES (#{boardCode}, #{lCode}, #{uId}, (SELECT board_l_code FROM board_large WHERE board_l_name= #{boardLName}), (SELECT board_m_code FROM board_medium WHERE board_m_name= #{boardMName}), #{boardTitle}, #{boardPw}, #{boardContent}, #{boardOpen}, 0, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_page_view = board.board_page_view + 1 WHERE board_code = #{boardCode}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board AS b WHERE b.board_code = #{boardCode} AND b.l_code = #{lCode}
SELECT bc.board_code FROM board_comment AS bc INNER JOIN board AS b ON bc.board_code = b.board_code WHERE bc.board_code = #{boardCode}
